thread.title: Marathi film celebs at 'Dagdi Chawl' premiere
thread.title_full: Marathi film celebs at 'Dagdi Chawl' premiere - Entertainment

author: The Centerstage Team
title: Marathi film celebs at 'Dagdi Chawl' premiere
text:
Filmmaker Chandrakant Kanse invited the creme de la creme of Marathi cinema to the premiere of his film 'Dagdi Chawl'.

Upendra Limaye 

Sachin Pilgaonkar 

Makarand Deshpande 
Makarand Deshpande, Sachin Pilgaonkar and Aditi Pohankar among others attended the screening.

Aditi Sudhir Pohankar 

Amole Gupte 

Rajkumar Hirani 

Raqesh Vashisth 
Rajkumar Hirani was also in attendance to appreciate Kanseâ€™s film loosely based on a gangster. Pics/ Yogen Shah
